description:
Chill out in DropTemp Cooling Cotton. Constructed with Saxx's DropTemp Technology, this new everyday collection amplifies your body's evaporative cooling capacity. At the same time, its premium cotton/Modal blend lets your balls bliss out in buttery softness.

Whether you're zipping from meeting to meeting, or hopping from bar to bar, its 4-way stretch fabric actively moves with you, while quickly wicking moisture and preventing odor. Designed to amp up the chill and cushy factor in your everyday routine, the DropTemp Cooling Cotton offers all-day performance so you can stay calm, especially cool, and collected.
name: Saxx Underwear DropTemp Cooling Cotton Boxer Brief Fly, 5" Inseam - Mens
